original_text:
I also could speak as you do,
    if you were in my place;
I could join words together against you
    and shake my head at you.
korean_text: 나도 너희처럼 말할 수 있나니 가령 너희 마음이 내 마음 자리에 있다 하자 나도 그럴 듯한 말로 너희를 치며 너희를 향하여 머리를 흔들 수 있느니라

sentences.original_text: I also could speak as you do,
if you were in my place;
I could join words together against you
sentences.korean_translation: 나도 너희를 거슬러 말을 지을 수 있고,

sentences.original_text: and shake my head at you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 향해 고개를 저을 수 있으리라.
